title: 我不知道缺少了什么mod
author: qwe131
txt_content:

顺便把mod的网址发下

replies.author: BlackJocker
replies.txt_content:
plo - Plants-To-Ores 植物矿石Mod
Dragonmounts - 龙骑士Mod
cfm - MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod 家具Mod
建议找腐竹叫他给你。
